    "Meet the Mayor" event at Cinnaholic

    Calendar
    Recreation Events
    Date
    03.06.2024 3:00 pm - 5:00 pm

    Description

    Residents are invited to join Mayor Jaclyn Veasy at Cinnaholic of Marlton for the latest "Meet the Mayor" event on Wednesday, March 6, from 3 to 5 p.m.

    Enjoy free coffee and hot chocolate over casual conversation with Mayor Veasy! Guests can ask questions about local issues, share concerns or just stop in and say hello!

    (And of course visitors are also more than welcome to buy some of the delicious gourmet cinnamon rolls, brownies, cookies, and more from this 100% plant-based bakery!

    Cinnaholic of Marlton is located in the Marlton Crossing Shopping Center (135 Route 73 South), near Chickie's and Pete's. See you there!

    Flat Menu | Accessibility | Website Terms
